commit message: Handle events with no speakers (Issue reported by B. Leseul)
Improved text display in About dialog.

Fragments option menus: keep a reference to MenuItems to change their
state directly instead of recreating the whole menu (works fine with
ActionBarCompat)

Replaced share ActionProvider with simple chooser Intent to ensure
compatibility with 4.0.3 and make more room for the bookmark icon.

Fixed problem during menu creation in TrackScheduleEventActivity in
Android 4.0.x
Update to new room naming system

Only broadcast the event id and start time instead of the full event
when adding a bookmark.
